allow: Bash(# Kill all python telegram bot processes pkill -9 -f ""python.*telegram_bot"" || true sleep 1 # Remove lock file rm -f ~/.openclaw/runtime/translation/tg_bot.lock # Verify everything is stopped ps aux)

Bash(# First, kill all instances sudo pkill -9 -f ""telegram_bot"" || pkill -9 -f ""telegram_bot"" || true # Unload the plist launchctl unload ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.translation.telegram-bot.plist || true sleep 2 # Check if anything is still running pgrep -af ""telegram_bot"")
Bash(# Check what''s respawning ps -p 49702 -o ppid,command # Get full process tree pstree -p 49702 || ps -o pid,ppid,command -p 49702 # Check launchd list for this service launchctl list)

Bash(# Check what tools we have available echo ""=== Gemini API ==="" grep -l ""GEMINI"" /Users/Code/workflow/translation/.env.v4.local && echo ""has .env.v4.local"" grep ""GEMINI_API_KEY"" /Users/Code/workflow/translation/.env.v4.local)
Bash(# 查看任务输出目录 WORK_ROOT=""/Users/ivy/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-Personal/Translation Task"" ls -la ""$WORK_ROOT/_VERIFY/"")
Bash(# 查看正确的输出目录路径 WORK_ROOT=""/Users/ivy/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-Personal/Translation Task"" echo ""=== Work root structure ==="" ls -la ""$WORK_ROOT/"")

Bash(# 检查正在运行的进程状态 ps -p 27193 -o pid,etime,cpu,mem,command || echo ""Process 27193 not found"" # 查看进程的日志输出（如果有） echo """" echo ""=== Checking for recent logs ==="" # 检查是否有 openclaw 命令输出 ls -la ~/.openclaw/logs/)

Bash(# 检查目标文件是否存在 ls -la ""/Users/ivy/V2- AI Readiness Teacher Survey \(Quantitative\) \(1\).docx"" 2>&1 # 搜索类似名称的文件 echo """" echo ""=== 搜索目标文件 ==="" find /Users/ivy -name ""*V2*AI*Teacher*Survey*"" -type f)

Bash(# 查看任务输入文件 WORK_ROOT=""/Users/ivy/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-Personal/Translation Task"" INBOX_DIR=""$WORK_ROOT/_INBOX/telegram/job_telegram_20260217_092850_197eab63"" echo ""=== 输入文件 ==="" ls -la ""$INBOX_DIR/"" # 查看任务元数据 echo """" echo ""=== 任务配置 ==="" cat ""$INBOX_DIR/../.system/job_meta.json"" | python3 -m json.tool)
Bash(# 查看 zai provider 的当前配置 cat ~/.openclaw/agents/main/agent/auth-profiles.json)
